tool_description:
Convert picture to ASCII image by URL or upload your own image.
Set the specific size for the ASCII result.
name: Img to ASCII
title: Img to ASCII

api_list.name: Get ASCII by id
api_list.description: Load previously generated ASCII image by id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://img-to-ascii.p.rapidapi.com/get-ascii/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "img-to-ascii.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://img-to-ascii.p.rapidapi.com/get-ascii/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "img-to-ascii.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
